title: Footprint Handbook - Bolivia 6th Edition
description:
Bolivia is home to enormous biodiversity: surreal volcanic landscapes, lush valleys, enormous salt flats and Amazon jungle. Footprints 6th edition Bolivia Handbook will guide you from the blinding-white expanse of Salar de Uyuni and racing round hairpin bends on the most dangerous road in the world to the stunning turquoise of Lake Titicaca. Great coverage of the top activities and sights in the country, including trekking, wildlife spotting & the Che Guevara trail. Loaded with information and suggestions on how to get off the beaten track, from swimming with pink river dolphins in the Amazon, to exploring the remnants of ancient civilizations. Includes comprehensive information on everything from transport and practicalities to history, culture & landscape. Plus all the usual accommodation, eating and drinking listings for every budget. l-color planning section to inspire and help you find the best experiences.

Bolivia (6th Edition) (Footprints Handbooks)
English | ISBN: 1909268666 | 2015 | EPUB | 224 pages | 27.57 MB
